title: Icon Gifting
body: Why is there no more icon gifting. I really want to gift my friend a TSM icon but there's no option. Can you please bring it back?

replies.body: This is exactly why I logged into the boards, otherwise i'm never here. I want icon gifting!

Due to a technical issue, Icon gifting was disabled for worlds. You can find our reference post on this [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-) Let me know if you have any questions.

Bring back icon gifting please.
There is no reason for you removing it Riot, so bring it back.
